profile:
Candoor Overhead Doors ltd, is a leader in the garage door industry. We are family owned and operated and established in 1988. Since then we have build a company based on reliability, honesty, knowledge and quality workmanship. We provide customers with premium installations, technical sales, residential and commercial services, and distribution/retail sales. We are also Ontario's top installation and supply company for security shutters, roller shutters, cabana shutters and roll up garage doors.

For over 30 years we have been servicing the GTA and surrounding regions; currently we service the GTA, Orangeville to Collingwood and Cottage Country (Muskoka, Haliburton, Georgian Bay, Gravenhurst, Bracebridge and Huntsville).

We have partnered with the highest of quality manufacturers to provide our customer with the most exceptional garage doors, garage door openers, security shutters and rolling door products. Whether your home is looking for a new and updated traditional look, modern garage door, something more classic looking, cabana/ pool house roller shutters or a security coverings for your windows or doors we guarantee we will have the right door for you at the right price!

profile:
Sentry Door, Inc. is a unique garage door installation and service company. We’ve stressed quality components, excellent installations, and then, if it’s still needed, competent service. Our team is professional, well-trained, friendly and customer-oriented.

Sentry Door Inc. established in 2011, is owned by James Martin, andJames has built and grown the company. on the values based on excellent products and service. on that approach and reputation. Most days in Ontario, we’re installing new doors that will work well for years. After all, “doors shouldn’t waste your time.” Contact us today for garage door installations or service.
services:
Residential
Our Richards-Wilcox residential garage door lineup is unique in the industry. Made in Ontario for Canadian climates, each overhead door is engineered for life with lifetime warranties and thick enough and tough enough to last a really, really long time. From Carriage House to Traditional designs, there's a door that matches your home and your lifestyle.

For heated garages, our doors and installs ensure minimal heat loss. We also offer homeowners garage door opener installations—with operator solutions that fit your environment—smart phone door management solutions, and routine service and maintenance for all garage door makes.

Be sure to come in to see our showroom!
  
Commercial
For commercial applications, we can install sectional insulated steel doors, aluminium overhead doors with glass for maximum light and visibility, or polycarbonate doors that are strong yet lightweight and translucent. Each door is built for the rigors of a workplace environment and frequent use, and are engineered for worry-free operation.

Sentry installs quick open door openers—with customizable speed settings. Keep in mind that if your door operator doesn't work quickly and well, your heat losses can be expensive—not to mention the frustration and time costs of inoperability. We address both with the right door, the right opener, and a maintenance commitmen
  
Agricultural
Agricultural door applications present unique environmental and wear challenges. We understand that, and offer you door solutions that are up to the challenge. Especially for dairy farmers, we offer an annual service contract for preventative maintenance, avoiding downtime and ensuring your doors work day after day.

Keep in mind that we also offer smart phone solutions that give you the option to open or close your doors or gates remotely.

Most of our ag installs include obstruction sensing, which reverses the door based on sensitivity settings you control. We avoid photo eyes due to issues in agricultural usage.

Please consult us for products and solutions for your farm.
warranty_terms: Yes. Kindly ask for details. Depends on project completed.
